text: tavada “(api kæmati ākārayaṭa) kumak hō sākṣiyak (deviyangē nabivarayā vana) ohu kerehi ohugē deviyan visin pahaḷa kaḷa yutu novēda?” yayida ovun pavasannāha. eyaṭa (nabiyē!) oba mesē pavasanu: “(oba kæmati prakāra sākṣiya pahaḷa nokara siṭīmaṭa hētuva obaṭa gupta dæyaki). gupta dæya siyalla allāhṭama ayatya. (ebævin eya oba dæna gænīmaṭa adahas kaḷahot) oba balāporottuven siṭinu. niyata vaśayenma mamat (obagē napuru vadanin obaṭa kumana vinnæhiyak pæmiṇennēda yanna) oba samaga balāporottuven siṭinnemi”
